articles.title: As ‘Bad Boys 4’ Hits Box Office, Are Moviegoers Ready to Embrace Will Smith After Oscars Slap? - Variety
articles.description: Sony's "Bad Boys: Ride or Die," the fourth installment in the Will Smith and Martin Lawrence-led series, will lead the box office in its debut.
articles.content:
Whatcha gonna do when “Bad Boys” comes for the box office? If you’re a theater owner, the answer is hopefully sell some tickets.

articles.title: Costumes of Star Wars: The Acolyte - Star Wars
articles.description: Costume designer Jennifer Bryan shares a closer look at Mae, Sol, Indara, and other characters from the new Star Wars series.
articles.content:
